Pre-Game Insights: The Oklahoma City Thunder are on a 14-game winning streak and will face the reigning NBA champions, the Boston Celtics.
Others: The Thunder have trailed each of the last three games by at least 12 points before coming back to win, including overcoming a 14-point deficit in Friday’s 117-107 home win over the Knicks. The Thunder are amid a four-game stretch against the top three teams from the Eastern Conference. After dropping four of their previous nine games, the Celtics enter Sunday’s game on a three-game winning streak.
